item.description:
Enjoy the Holiday with Laughs, Food and a Yankee Gift Swap at City's Sport Grille in Spare Time Bowling..

Tickets are only $10.00 (plus a $1. meetup fee)

Please arrive at 7:30pm, so we can all meetup, sit together, have a Yankee Gift Swap ($10. gift), appetizers, drinks and lots of laughs with a comedy show. What a better way to enjoy the holiday.

The Comedian headliner that will be performing is Dave Rattigan and two other great comics.

I hope to see you all there!!

Also, I will be performing in the show!

ALL MEETUPS Policy
Please remember, RSVP yes only if you plan to attend an event to allow us to plan accordingly. If you RSVP yes and change your mind on attending, you MUST provide at least 24 hours notice or you will be considered a "No Show". After 5 "No Shows", you will no longer be able to attend meetup events.
item.how_to_find_us: Reservation will be under Tammy in the City Sports Grille in Spare Time Bowling (formaly know as Yankee Lanes)
item.name: Holiday Gift Swap, Appetizers & Comedy at City's Sport Grille in Yankee Lanes
